statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transaction_details ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, merchant_name FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-01' AND merchant_name = 'Amazon';
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_details;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_time ASC, merchant_name;
SELECT transaction_id, merchant_name FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, merchant_name FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, merchant_name FROM transaction_details WHERE merchant_name LIKE '%Mart' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_time, merchant_name FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, merchant_name FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_amount, merchant_name FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE merchant_name = 'Amazon' AND transaction_amount < 500
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_category FROM merchants
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT merchant_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY merchant_name;
SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.transaction_date, merchants.merchant_name FROM transactions JOIN merchants ON transactions.merchant_name = merchants.merchant_name;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 AND merchant_name LIKE '%shop%';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT date, amount, merchant_name FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, date, amount FROM transactions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT merchant_name, location FROM merchants WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY merchant_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT transaction_id, date, time, amount, merchant_name FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM merchants WHERE location = 'New York' AND category = 'Retail';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT transaction_id, date, time, amount, merchant_name FROM transactions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_city, merchant_country FROM merchants WHERE merchant_country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, merchant_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-10-25';
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_city, merchant_country FROM merchants WHERE merchant_country = 'USA' AND merchant_city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details;
SELECT amount, date, time FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT merchant_name, location FROM merchant_details ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, date, amount, status FROM transaction_history WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, date, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE merchant_name = 'ABC Inc.'
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.date, t.amount, m.merchant_name FROM transaction_details t JOIN merchant_details m ON t.merchant_name = m.merchant_name
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = '123456'
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transaction_details
